title: War on Christmas: Santa vs Mongol Horde - Total War: Santa Invasion Mod Gameplay
description:
Happy Christmas everyone :D  - After conquering most of Eurasia, Genghis Khan heard rumors of a secret kingdom in the North.  A kingdom that can not be conquered.  The North Pole!  It is Christmas Eve and the Mongols find themselves at the gates of the North Pole.  Will Santa defeat Genghis and save Christmas or will Genghis become the new Santa?  This is the War on Christmas! Enjoy the Battle :D

This is a mod for Medieval 2 Total War called Total War: Santa Invasion!
Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/total-war-santa-invasion

Jackie's Channel:  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
